short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean Youtube view and facilitate to focus on the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Cleanup is designed to simplify and enhance your viewing experience by removing distracting elements such as the comments section, recommendations, and other unnecessary parts of the YouTube interface. Perfect for users who want to focus solely on the video without clutter, this extension is easy to toggle on and off with a button.

Open source code at: https://github.com/GabrielGod1/youtube-cleanup
